info.headline: Hard Freeze Warning issued January 14 at 3:34PM CST until January 15 at 11:00AM CST by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM CST MONDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 15. * WHERE...Portions of south central and southwest Arkansas, north central and northwest Louisiana, southeast Oklahoma and northeast Texas. * WHEN...Until 11 AM CST Monday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, sensitive vegetation, and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
